description: Number of partitions of n into distinct odd primes.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=0..1000
prog: (Haskell)a024939 = p a065091_list where   p _  0 = 1   p (k:ks) m = if m < k then 0 else p ks (m - k) + p ks m-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 05 2012
author: _Clark Kimberling_
extensions: Corrected and extended by _Vladeta Jovovic_, Jul 20 2003
